title: This matter of motivation
abstract: 2 reels. 59 min. sd. colour. 16 mm.   discussion leader's guide
description: SUMMARY: A series of seven films on motivation based on original material developed by the Caterpillar Tractor Company from the concepts of Frederick Herzberg. Teaches the effectiveness of behavioural science motivation techniques. Covers specific personnel problems by means of case studies.;"CONTENTS: 1. The basic instructional film. 28 min. - 2. The puzzle. 6 min. - 3. The roadblock. 6 min. - 4. The gilded lilly. 5 min. - 5. The pacesetter. 6 min. - 6. The nice guy. 4 min. - 7. The ball of fire. 4 min."
